page.title: 18ENTERTAINMENT
page.content: There is a long tradition of amateur drama in the village but the present group, which consists of about 14 regular members, has been putting on full length plays since 1970. We have been helped by many people in various ways and we are most grateful to them all. We meet once a fortnight from May until the end of July for play read- ing, and rehearse twice a week from Sept. until the final rehearsals at the end of Nov. before the chosen play is performed for 3 evenings in the Village Hall. When all expenses for each production have been met, we are generally able to give donations to a few deserving causes. Our members are all busy people either with full time careers or helping with village and other activities, and we all enjoy the times we have together. Our current production is "My Three Angels".
